sentences: Kui sa teaksid k천ik selle kohta, mida ma teen... siis tean, et sulle tunduks see lihtne.
Ma usun, et nad juba teaksid, et see ei ole 천iguslik.
Ta soovib, et me teaksime, kuidas sellesse p채채seda.
context: The word 'teaksid' is a conditional form of the verb 'teha' meaning 'to know.' It translates to 'would know' in English and is used in hypothetical or conditional sentences. It often appears when discussing what someone would do if certain conditions were met.
